thread.title: Phoenix Suns point guard Ronnie Price returns to team after illness
thread.title_full: Phoenix Suns point guard Ronnie Price returns to team after illness

title: Phoenix Suns point guard Ronnie Price returns to team after illness
text:
Phoenix Suns point guard Ronnie Price returns to team after illness THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   1:30   1:30   
Organizations: 
Arizona (629) 
PHOENIX â€” The Arizona Republic reports that Phoenix Suns point guard Ronnie Price returned to the team Friday for practice after being out with mononucleosis since last appearing in a game Oct. 13. 
The Republic says ( http://bit.ly/1ONnXFS ) that Price, pain-free after a February elbow surgery, had averages of of 8.0 points, 3.0 rebounds, 2.7 assists and 1.0 steals in 21.5 minutes per game his first three preseason appearances. 
Since then, he was at home trying to recover from his illness. 
"Listening to the radio and listening to the games that weren't televised and following the play-by-play on my computer, that sucks. It's not fun. Being back in here is definitely better than being at home," he said.
